title: Bin Chicken and the Christmas Turkey
description: Bah humbug! The city is buzzing, shoppers run this way and that, there’s carols and lights and a Santa Claus hat! But if a bird is clever... if a bird is a smartie... a bird can still have a fabulous Christmas party!Ibis is in a flap and can’t find any trash, but Bush Turkey knows exactly where to find a feast to gobble!
author: Kate Temple
